results.content:
It seems as though these lessons are being made up on the spot- maybe from a loose outline.

Code (that isn't part of the lesson focus) changes from video to video making it extremely hard to follow along, as well as troubleshoot discrepancies between what I'm seeing and what the instructor is showing. There's a lesson where you are instructed to make changes and in the following lesson, as the instructor is adding some other elements to the same file, those changes are reverted.

I managed to mitigate all of this through the first half of the course, but eventually just didn't have the patience to troubleshoot a course that's obviously created and updated on-the-fly.

Bottom line: there's some really good info in here but the unprofessional presentation makes it not worthwhile.
